biography_text: GUTHRIE, Brett, a Representative from Kentucky; born in Florence, Lauderdale County, Ala., February 18, 1964; graduated from Bradshaw High School, Florence, Ala., 1982; B.S., United States Military Academy, West Point, N.Y., 1987; M.P.P.M., Yale University, New Haven, Conn., 1997; United States Army, 1987-1990; United States Army Reserve, 1990-2002; business executive; member of the Kentucky state senate, 1999-2008; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Eleventh and to the four succeeding Congresses (January 3, 2009-present).

post_secondary_degrees.institution: United States Military Academy, West Point, N.Y.
